website_summaries.verdict: The best budget road cycling shoe that comes as a complete package for beginners.
pros: Comes with pedals and cleats in addition to the cycling shoes
Shoe fabric is breathable for proper ventilation to reduce sweat
cons: Provided cleats can be difficult to clip in securely

customer_reviews.title: These run a bit big but work great. I wear a Nike 10 and I ordered ...
customer_reviews.text: These run a bit big but work great. I wear a Nike 10 and I ordered the 44.5 size. The width feels correct but the toe box is long. I would order a size 43 if I were buying another pair. These shoes worked great all summer and got me out on the road putting on loads of hard miles. I have no complaints about comfort or performance. I would buy these again instead of the name brand shoes costing twice as much.
customer_reviews.author: Scott S

customer_reviews.title: Terribly made shoes - want full refund
customer_reviews.text: Bottom clip broke, and the soul of the shoes came off. Very unimpressed- would like a full refund. Please let me know how to get a refund
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Trapped
customer_reviews.text: These shoes trap your feet, making it difficult to get release quickly. I have not fallen over yet, as I have come to a stop by a railing, tree, or other stationary object, in order to have time to pull in just the right series of ways to get one foot free. Then begin work on the other. This is after loosening the cleats substantially. These are quite different in this one regard, from other shoes I have used, which were not a problem to pop out of. Other reviewers warned me, and I thought, "How difficult can it be? The price looks good."
customer_reviews.author: Slave of Christ

customer_reviews.title: Question for anyone else that also purchased these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these and just received them. On the bottom of the shoe there are 3 threaded holes for the cleat, but there is also a set of 4 threads that move back and forth. Does anyone know what these holes are for/know how I can secure then so they aren't moving while I'm riding? See attached photo. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Bernard C.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for road biking!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoes for a beginner biker like me and that too at a very reasonable price. Ordered thru Amazon prime and these arrived within 1 day, Great speed of delivery!!! Have used these for couple of rides (50 miles+ total) so far and these work great. Would strongly advice to practice a lot to get the cleats into pedals and specially release from pedals before hitting busy roads with frequent stops.
customer_reviews.author: Ajay Chaudhary

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes and pedals
customer_reviews.text: My last pair of shoes and spd pedals lasted 19 years so I definitely got much use out of them. I hesitated buying these Venzo shoes and pedals as the price seemed too good to be true. I was relieved when I saw them because they didn't look cheap. Installation and fit was fine and I really like the pedals....in fact I prefer them to my old pair for ease of clipping and unclipping. They ride great and feel properly sized so I am hoping they last a long long time.
customer_reviews.author: Grey Goose

customer_reviews.title: A surprisingly great deal!
customer_reviews.text: I wear 10 in most every shoe I've ever had, went 9 here (43) and it's snug but a perfect fit for a bike shoe for me. Quality is better than I'd hoped for. This set replaced the Ritchey pedals/cleats and Performance shoes I'd been using for years, and the shoes are as good or better and the pedals/cleats far better. I only ride about 25 miles a week but pretty sure this could handle far more. Easily surpassed my expectations and then some.
customer_reviews.author: ReadMoreVonnegut

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought these
customer_reviews.text: Put on and tried today. First time being clipped in. Increased my 2 mile speed from 6 Mins 45 secs to 5 mins 55 secs. Working on my speed.... Anywho, good price. They work. Will probably upgrade soon, but for $70ish, totally worth the gamble.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley J. Liebert

customer_reviews.title: they fit very good and are easy to clip in/out of
customer_reviews.text: These are my first clip-in shoes so I don’t have anything to compare them too. That being said, they fit very good and are easy to clip in/out of. Overall comfortable but after long riding the top of my feet behind my toes start hurting. The other issue is that because of the design of the cleats you won’t get very far walking in them. Not sure if this is the case with most bike shoes but you woulf need to bring an extra pair of shoes if you plan on walking anywhere after getting off the bike.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: Gets you going at a cheap price
customer_reviews.text: Very good starter set if you're unsure if cycling will work out for you. I've already logged 800 miles with this set and have only had minor dealings that I suppose should be expected at this price. Those minor things are, a little float when clicked in, an occasional clicking caused by the shoe itself. Other than that, acceptable for now. I'll be upgrading next year.
customer_reviews.author: SMC

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe/clip set. Well worth the $$...
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit great, are comfy and the clip system is fantastic. Worth far more than the price I paid. Even the bike shop that installed them had nice things to say. They've made my rides far more comfortable and faster. My speed picked up dramatically being in the clips. John Taglieri Triathlete
customer_reviews.author: Laureen

customer_reviews.title: Insanely worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely difficult to use at first (took me a few weeks and even still fall over very rarely), but once you get used to it, it's amazing. And at its price point, why wouldn't you get it?
customer_reviews.author: Calvin G.

customer_reviews.title: but I think this is a great shoe. Very comfortable and easy to click in ...
customer_reviews.text: I am new to road biking, but I think this is a great shoe. Very comfortable and easy to click in and out. I also like the adjustability of the cleats. I usually wear a size 8 shoe casually, and originally ordered a size 42. These turned out to be too big, but in all honesty I should have gone with the 41 to begin with. I find that when ordering athletic shoes you should always go down a half size from your casual shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Warren R.

customer_reviews.title: Entry Level
customer_reviews.text: No these are not Shimano nor are they fizik. But they are cheap! They feel nothing like a good pair of cleats and for the weight weenies they weigh a ton. But they’re perfect for the causal rider, the one that loves the sport but doesn’t have the time nor the money to do it full time, both the cleats and the pedals are solid, they’re not high class but they sure as hell last. Only little concern is the maintenance, the cleats are held down by screws and when you unclip constantly they start to shift, I would suggest adjusting the cleats every 3-7 days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and great for indoor and road bikes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great. Replaced old ones which had fallen apart after hundreds of mileage and several years. These shoes are a good weight, stiffness, and comfort. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Lorry

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative for a pinning shoe
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad shoe if you don’t want to spend top dollar on the expensive stuff
customer_reviews.author: Jose nieves

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I’m excited about using cleats for first time after a couple years using normal pedals, these ones seem the right o es for beginners
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Alba

customer_reviews.title: shoes are great. clips are not
customer_reviews.text: These shoes work great. very comfortable and a very nice look. The clips that they come with dont work with any bike that I have come across. I do spin class at the gym and rec center. I also have a standing cycle at the house. I had to buy seperate clips after receiving these to fit the other bikes. Still a grat deal for the shoes themself. Just keep in mind you should order new clips at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Juarez

customer_reviews.title: Killer deal! Comfortable shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Great kit! I was hesitant at first because I thought there has to be a catch for this cheap price, but honestly these shoes are very comfortable and have worked out great. I ride at least 3 days/week and so far have had no problem with this set!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy S. Pile

customer_reviews.title: Not able to un clip
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are a good deal, but just know these are knock offs of Shimono! I had a very hard time un-clipping! I bought a pair of SPD versions. I fell off the bike!!
customer_reviews.author: The tricter

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, right after buying I put 150 miles in the saddle with these shoes and pedals....all held up great and were very comfortable! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rob Parks

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are my first clip in pedals and shoes, so I have nothing to compare to. They're comfortable, easy to put on your foot, and have a bit of lateral float that helps with the knees. The tightness of the shoe to binding fit is adjustable, but I can't seem to get it right. I think I'm going to get some non-look pedals since I seem to have more trouble clicking in than everyone else.
customer_reviews.author: W. Biesinger

customer_reviews.title: Sleek
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size 12(47) fit. Very comfortable. Easy to install the cleat. Really like them. Pedals attached right to my Trek road bike. Easy clip in an out.
customer_reviews.author: Mihailo Mazon

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Great for beginners! I learned how to ride much more fluently on with this set.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoes fit perfect I use it on my road ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes fit perfect I use it on my road bike every day. Will be checking to see if I can get the black in color.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Romeo

customer_reviews.title: SHOES ARE OK THE CLEATS AR NOT ACCEPTABLE
customer_reviews.text: SHOES ARE GOOD FOR THE MONE AND LOOK NICE, THE PEDALS ARE POOR. IT IS HARD TO GET OUT OF THEM CAN CAUSE YOU TRAOUBLEIN RIDING FOR MORE OFTEN RIDING THEY ARE TO LOW COST AND TOO MUCH PAIN
customer_reviews.author: Mister Tony

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Only put a mile on them so far. Will add to review when I get more miles on them.
customer_reviews.author: Bubba nuts

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable cycling shoe
customer_reviews.text: The perfect, tennis shoe like fit. Very soft and comfortable. I purchased a 43 size and I normally take a 9 1/2 to 10 shoe size, and they fit like a glove. And they even come with cleats and pedals. Very reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Everything is perfect except for one thing: the pedals are off balanced. So you habe to flip the pedal around with your foot and slip the clip into it before it rotates back to its unbalanced position
customer_reviews.author: Dallas Blackburn

customer_reviews.title: Shoes 5 Stars Cleat and Pedals 1 star
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are awesome, the cleats are OK, the pedals not so much. For the price you can't go wrong, but the pedals leave something to be desired. These are low end, but they doesn't mean they shouldn't work. The cleats don't want to come out of the pedals, I have been riding with clipless for several years and after month's of use I still struggle getting the left cleat out. I finally switched to a different pedal and cleat and now the shoes work great. I was hoping to get an extra set of pedals for my trainer, but now I just paid more for shoes than I would have liked to.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoes and cleats, pedals are just ok
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Fits as shown, comfortable and seems well-built. It is what you pay for, however, the pedals are not the best and, if not install properly may produce squeaking sounds when pedaling. Good product overall. Cleats are good.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fit. They work great
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these when I bought my first road bike. Awesome fit. They work great. Definitely a deal considering you have to buy everything separate at performance bike shop at a markup
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Lopez

customer_reviews.title: good value - good shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a temporary training shoe but they feel good and have held up through my triathlon and all the training. I will just keep them til they wear out before replacing them. Great buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: KewlGadget

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are falling apart.
customer_reviews.text: After two weeks of use, no rain or wet conditions, the shoes are starting to fall apart. So basically after 10 days the shoes started squeaking and a few days later I found that the hard plastic sole was starting to detach from the rest of the shoe. Had not expected them to last for years, but 2 weeks, seriously? I have had no problems with the pedals.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bicycling Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these maily for the price The shoes fit me i usually don't but shoes on line cause i have to try my shoes on before i buy them. Anyway these shoes fit and are comfortable the pedals were easy to install. The only problem i had was getting the shoe out of the pedal
customer_reviews.author: Frank L. Gadson

customer_reviews.title: Defective issue with screw hole on shoe, so cleat won't attach
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit great, but one of the shoes doesn't have the proper hole for the screw to attach the cleat, even though the other one does, so the cleat won't attach properly and becomes hard to clip in/out sometimes, which is dangerous
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good and priced right!
customer_reviews.text: Just priced right for the beginner or the cyclists who never used them and want to experiment. I used them for two months now and I am very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: luvtechnology

customer_reviews.title: Tried it out for a week and didn't like the shoes very well
customer_reviews.text: Tried it out for a week and didn't like the shoes very well. They didn't clip in very well. I returned spent a little more money to get something better. don't waste the time on these.
customer_reviews.author: JDR

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the price.
customer_reviews.text: You can't ask for more at this price. This is my first pair and I'm glad I made the choice. Now I know what to look for when it's time for a new pair. The shoes are well made, but you can tell the difference when compared to the bigger name brands, but those run $150+ for a reason.
customer_reviews.author: Foster

customer_reviews.title: great shoes NOT GOOD PEDALS
customer_reviews.text: im a amateur rider and the shoes where the exact size I order i would buy them again. althought the pedals are terrible you cannot get out of them easily although i turned the screw to the loose configuration, nop, it didnt work. THE shoes are excellent for that price are great!
customer_reviews.author: jose arturo

customer_reviews.title: Soles came off 40 miles in
customer_reviews.text: I just got back from my second ride on these shoes. I arrived home on foot. Coming to a stop, I went to unclip so I could put my foot down. Instead of unclipping, the sole came halfway off of the shoe. I tried the other shoe, same result. Shoes had less than 40 miles on them. I will never buy venzo again.
customer_reviews.author: wongwei2150

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with the purchase as the shoes appear to be ...
customer_reviews.text: After reading other reviews I elected not to use the pedals that come with this set, but rather, just use the shoes. I am happy with the purchase as the shoes appear to be good quality and the color scheme is pretty awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Olsen

customer_reviews.title: and the clips are easy to install and also easy to clip in and ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit well, and the clips are easy to install and also easy to clip in and out of. No regrets in buying this set.
customer_reviews.author: BChild

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoes to go with the spinning bike I bought. Comes with the pedal parts that the shoe clicks into.
customer_reviews.author: Duff

customer_reviews.title: Didn't like them at all
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like them at all, they wear down easily and they are oddly big in the toes for me.
customer_reviews.author: Liz s

customer_reviews.title: These fit great and the heel locks in tight so you don’t ...
customer_reviews.text: These fit great and the heel locks in tight so you don’t have to worry about slipping around and getting blisters.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary D Scott Moore

customer_reviews.title: These are really excellent cycling shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are really excellent cycling shoes. I wasn't sure how stiff the sole was going to be or how well they were going to ride, but after putting 100 miles on them, they're fantastic!!! And they come with cleats and pedals ..... huge plus. Definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Israel Akpadiaha

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product worked as intended, but it was ultimately not for me and my style of riding.
customer_reviews.author: Joel S

customer_reviews.title: Pedal with a looset screw and nut
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product and one od pedals had a screw and nut loosed. I tried to puted back it was imposible. I never use the shoes, still in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 700 miles nd counting
customer_reviews.text: 700 miles with this combo. Zero problems. Probably have another 300 + miles before I will even think about replacing them. Excellent product
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Watson

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best value
customer_reviews.text: This purchase was my first set of shoes/clips/pedals for my road bike. I am fully pleased with the quality and workmanship of this product so far. I have put about 100 miles on the combo. I used wikipedia for the metric to standard shoe size conversion and had no issues there. I use my road bike to compete in olympic distance triathlons. I dont ride much other than that, so if you put tons of miles on your bike these may wear out though they seem pretty solid to me not having much experience. I would recommend these for anyone who doesnt ride a ton and is looking for an inexpensive alternative to the ridiculuously priced brand name models.
customer_reviews.author: Reasonably Satisfied

customer_reviews.title: Order a size lower than normal
customer_reviews.text: Okay so I'm glad I read the reviews. I am a size 9 in every other shoe on the market but in these I am a size 8 mens. I ordered one size down hoping these reviews were correct and they were. Thank you all for the help view reviews. Other than that they are extremely comfortable and feel good on so far. I will update if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: amyr

customer_reviews.title: Great product, fast shipping, awesome deal
customer_reviews.text: Shoes, cleats, and pedals were better than advertised, and a really good deal. Arrived on time, and in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: chuck stewart

customer_reviews.title: the shoes are not bad with the price specially if its your first time ...
customer_reviews.text: I got the right fit, the shoes are not bad with the price specially if its your first time to use one. Upgrade later.
customer_reviews.author: Allen E.

customer_reviews.title: Nice...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what i'm looking for. Very light, easy to install, very good quality and works like a charm. Highly recommended! Fast shipping too.
customer_reviews.author: Ramil Basco

customer_reviews.title: The shoes are fine but the cleats and petals are cheap imitations of ...
customer_reviews.text: These are cheap knockoffs. The shoes are fine but the cleats and petals are cheap imitations of read petals. I kept the shoes and bought a set of real cleats and petals.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Spin class worthy
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable and easy to ride in considering the low price. I use them for spin class. They work great.
customer_reviews.author: matt walker

customer_reviews.title: Great starter pair for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great set of shoes, fantastic price. these are the first clip less shoes I've ever owned, and they've been great. the only issue that i have isn't really with the product itself, it's the actual design of this style of clip. with the clip being non-recessed, if you have to walk the bike anywhere, you sound like a crappy tap dancer and it ends up scraping up the clips. however, if you are looking to get into more serious cycling without dropping some serious cash, these are a great place to start.
customer_reviews.author: patrick flerlageTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are my first clip shoes, so hard to compare. What I can say is that after falling 4 times, dragging my feet as a newbie, cleats still work great. I have to say these area also my first shoes I have ordered online so never tried them on. I have to say who ever designed them knows what they are doing they are the most perfect fitting shoes I have ever worn. I would compare them to $200 dress shoes I own, in fact I think they area actually better fit. Recommended? Yes this is a must buy if these are your first ones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love them. I should have bought much
customer_reviews.text: I've had my bike for 8 years, these are my first shoes and clips , I love them. I should have bought much sooner
customer_reviews.author: William Wright

customer_reviews.title: they have proved to be very sturdy. The price vs
customer_reviews.text: Although the cleats itself are plastic and feel kinda cheap, they have proved to be very sturdy. The price vs. the local bike shop for shoes and pedals was the deciding factor. I was a bit cautious, but they have proven to be a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Marco G.

customer_reviews.title: What a bargain
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. The shoes actually fit well after ordering online. Pedals and cleats are great. This is a great purchase to start using cycling shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Kucharski

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Quality seems great have had zero complaints about them went off of sizing chart in the photos to find right size fit perfect for size 12.
customer_reviews.author: wayne casey

customer_reviews.title: A 6 months review
customer_reviews.text: Well I've had this setup for about 6 months now and here is my take on them: 1. The pedals are holding up so far, cliping in and out is easy. My only complaint about the pedals is that they feel a little wiggly on the shoes while pedling. No play in the bearings though. 2. The shoes are nice and stiff, and they're holding up so so. I've worn a small hole in the right heel. 3. The cleats are a bit worn down but it is to be expected. This was definitely a good buy
customer_reviews.author: Billy & Berkeley K.

customer_reviews.title: Bough these for my son... he loves ...
customer_reviews.text: Bough these for my son...he loves the shoes and pedals, but a little tricky to disengage shoe from pedals sometimes. Package arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: wannaboo1

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Despite making several adjustments to the pedals and cleats it is still difficult to unclick the left shoe. hummmm
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: He seems happy with this set
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for my son who is an avid road biker. He seems happy with this set.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Value for a new Rider!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value for a new rider. Most of the shoes I was looking at in local stores were $100 by themselves. This is everything you need all in one set for a great price. I would recommend it to any new rider.
customer_reviews.author: Mason R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My dad love this shoes and I'm happy for the purchased I did!
customer_reviews.author: Carla Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Yet again.
customer_reviews.text: I have rated this product once before. If it wasn't ok I wouldn't be buying 2 more pairs. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: IyerE

customer_reviews.title: Cleat broke on second ride
customer_reviews.text: Very displeased. On my second ride the screw in the cleat stripped and my shoe was stuck on the pedal, very poor design and dangerous is you are looking to disengage quickly.
customer_reviews.author: DShaw

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great cycling shoes and the pedals are good too.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Cook

customer_reviews.title: I am fully satisfied with this product
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pair of clipless pedals, shoes, cleats. It is exactly what I expected. For the price, I am fully satisfied with this product. The shoes are surprisingly comfortable. I ordered size 44 and usually wear 10US.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginners or anyone who wants to get biking ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for beginners or anyone who wants to get biking shoes / cleats. If you have some more money laying around double sided step ins would be a great to have. You get used to the slips and clip ins though.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I got a size down and they fit good. Comfortable shoe. The bottom grip is wearing somewhat quicjly
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: no issues so far. just wish they were a little more comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Hmarin760

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: These shoes and pedals are great. I have only used them a handful of times, but have had zero issues with them and for the price am extremely happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Louis Slezak II

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not bad kit for the money; practice clip/unclipping if you're not used to them.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Denker

customer_reviews.title: Buy cheap, buy twice
customer_reviews.text: Get the job done but won't last long. Spend double at a bike shop for good pedals and shoes. Ended up returning because the plastic on bottom started to waste away at 150 miles
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas W. Popa

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are great, but they are super pointy in the toe so it looks weird
customer_reviews.author: Justin Fairclolth

customer_reviews.title: ... your looking for a budget shoes these are very good so far had them since
customer_reviews.text: If your looking for a budget shoes these are very good so far had them since dic-2014
customer_reviews.author: A.Galle

customer_reviews.title: They arrived on time and are great for my first set the They fit well and ...
customer_reviews.text: They arrived on time and are great for my first set the They fit well and sized well my shoe size is 11and ordered the same and fits perfectly very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry Gleason

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very functional, able to click in and out of pedal with ease
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe thus far just runs a bit big. I would advise ordering half a size down.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Really nice product. Is not a high quality road shoes, but worth if, moreover came if cleats and pedals. There aren't any other with best price.
customer_reviews.author: Gilson Marques

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Working for me so far, I have over 1000 miles on them.
customer_reviews.author: Tait Lambert

customer_reviews.title: good biking shoes
customer_reviews.text: light and easy to put on, I bought these shoes to also use for indoor cycling classes, however, the cleats for gym bikes don't fit, needed to order a second set with two-hole cleats. Fortunately, shoes are fitted for both 3 and 2-hole cleats.
customer_reviews.author: Aran Paulus

customer_reviews.title: A pretty good set altogether though
customer_reviews.text: Screws very difficult to drive in, then they loosen every week or so. A pretty good set altogether though.
customer_reviews.author: eldorado

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice Beginner Cycling Shoes!!!
customer_reviews.text: My uncles are all club cyclists and enjoy the sport entirely. Im now 21 and just caught the bug for the sport! I've only been in it for a while but can already tell it's an expensive sport for sure but these shoes are really affordable! Haven't used them yet so this is just the pre-review but i got to say they fit perfect light weight and very stylish... Josh.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Screws get loose
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased this screws got loose, other than that it is comfortable but needs to improved
customer_reviews.author: sammy

customer_reviews.title: First professional touring shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are my first professional riding shoes the shipping was right on time the shoe fit great however, alittle tough putting the cleat on the bottom of the shoe other than that for the price and construction of the shoe there Great.
customer_reviews.author: D.POZ

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes/pedals/cleats for entry level
customer_reviews.text: Very nice entry level shoes for first time user. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael de Pina Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: one of the shoes came with a missing mount point. argh.... but, they still work.
customer_reviews.author: Ovywon

customer_reviews.title: Theres no beating this combo for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great set-up to get riding clipped in. I just got back into road biking after taking 3 years off and didn't want to spend a ton on shoes an pedals, so I picked up this great combo. I wear a size 9 and the shoes fit great. I previously have used Look and Shimano pedals, I won't say these are better then these higher end brands but they work perfectly for my weekend rides.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: Not high high quality but are working great for me so far
customer_reviews.text: Not high high quality but are working great for me so far. Have taken 3 15 mile rides and they were comfortable and never came loose.
customer_reviews.author: Timbob

customer_reviews.title: Great price i have used them for many rides 800 ...
customer_reviews.text: Great price i have used them for many rides 800 miles in all still working good if anyone is looking for a first set i would say buy these 5 stars thanks again.
customer_reviews.author: john den hamer

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done! Uppers are not the most resilient but they work!
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Venzo Cycling Shoes
customer_reviews.text: The combination of cycling shoes and pedals were attractive but, if I were to do it again, I would go with a different combination due to the inability to walk in these shoes (I carry beach shoes for the stores) plus my toes cramp on longer rides (in excess of 80 miles).
customer_reviews.author: Darrell

customer_reviews.title: i like them
customer_reviews.text: it's my first pair of cycling shoes, for the price a good deal,order one size smaller.have nothing to compare them to. Will buy better shoes next time.
customer_reviews.author: gary mazurowski

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need to get started in cycling! Definitely worth the price! I was actually surprised of the quality of everything included because it's actually pretty good for the price you're paying.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

product_meta.title: Venzo Road Bike Compatible with Shimano SPD SL Look Cycling Bicycle Shoes & Pedals 42
product_meta.description:
Size Chart
Europe 40, US Men 6.5, Japanese 24.5cm
Europe 41, US Men 7.5, Japanese 25.5cm
Europe 42, US Men 8, Japanese 26cm
Europe 42.5, US Men 8.5, Japanese 26.5cm
Europe 43, US Men 9, Japanese 27cm
Europe 44, US Men 9.5, Japanese 27.5cm
Europe 44.5, US Men 10, Japanese 28cm
Europe 45, US Men 10.5, Japanese 28.5cm
Europe 46, US Men 11, Japanese 29cm
Europe 47, US Men 12, Japanese 30cm


Cycling Shoes:
Features the award-winning technology for performance.
Quick-drying, highly-breathable mesh and synthetic upper.
Textile lining with removable sockliner.
Low-cut construction for a light, fast fit and feel.
Flexible forefoot and a running shoe beveled heel.
Compatible with all SPD, SPD SL and Look KEO style pedal systems.
Weight: 586g or 21 oz (Size 44)

Wellgo W40 Pedals Look "ARC" Compatible
Body: Aluminium
Cage: Aluminium
Spindle: Cr-Mo
Bearing: Ball Bearing
Size: 84.8x91.7x34.2mm
Thread size: 9/16"
Cleats: Wellgo RC-5 (Included) or Look ARC Compatible (Not Included)
Weight: 286g or 9.7 oz/Pair
Package: Two pedals with cleats
Made in Taiwan
